settings.title: About
settings.text:
LILIXIR is a Canadian company, with headquarters in Montreal Quebec, creating high-performance skincare for conscious consumers looking for natural premium products. 

Our brand name originated from the fusion of Lily, the name of an elegant, versatile and resilient flower (fortunately, also on Quebec's flag and founder's name), and Elixir – magic beauty potion, luxury drops for flawless beauty and prolonged youth.

Our founder is a Certified Expert in organic skincare.

settings.title: Mission
settings.text:
Our mission is to provide effortless skin-changing formulas for the conscious consumers who would like to benefit from a high-performance organic and natural skincare.

Since more and more people are disappointed with the skincare products they buy, LILIXIR is here to make a substantial difference through results which will exceed the highest expectations.

We promise less and deliver more.

settings.title: Vision
settings.text:
Our vision is a beauty brand that cares and contributes to achieving wellbeing on every level: healthy skin, happy people, safe planet.

LILIXIR aspires to guide each person towards a life-changing revelation about what is inside of the box, why it is there and how it may help them.

Only equipped with this knowledge they will be able to compare skincare products and their ingredients, then make an informed, wise choice.

settings.text:
Brand Essence

LILIXIR's brand essence is built on the foundation of delivering a premium and exquisite experience to our valued customers. It encapsulates the essence of our brand and shapes the way people perceive and interact with our products. At LILIXIR, we strive to create an unparalleled sense of luxury and refinement in every aspect of our brand, from the formulation of our products to the packaging and customer experience.

Beauty is a state of mind.

We believe knowledge is beautiful. LILIXIR empowers the conscious consumer starting with education. We are open-minded and curious, and we educate on the ingredients and their potential. Through our organic, concentrated formulas, we offer our customers a chance to make mindful, informed decisions while providing effective and transformative skincare.

settings.title: Only plant-based ingredients
settings.text:
Vegan

We believe in the power of active botanicals used in our natural restorative elixirs, concentrated solutions and sophisticated science based formulations handcrafted with love in Montreal, Quebec.  

100% plant-based, 100% organic certified ingredients.   

Conscious Consumerism - "LESS IS MORE"

We believe it's important to offer high-performant multi-functional concentrated formulations, that deliver multiple benefits at the same time. Consequently, less quantity is needed, fewer items will be created, and less natural resources will be used.

settings.title: Sustainable packaging
settings.text:
We believe sustainability is the key to a better future. Humans rely on natural resources for business, activities, and survival. Ignoring sustainability can lead to the exhaustion of natural resources. 

When creating LILIXIR sustainable packaging solutions, our team believes in using an all-encompassing strategy. It must be of the highest quality while simultaneously minimizing the impact on the environment
- Exclusively glass bottles for LILIXIR serums
- Boxes and wrapping paper made with 100% recycled FSC-certified paper 
- Water-activated adhesive, so LILIXIR tape is fully compostable
- Printed with renewable soy-based ink or no ink at all .

settings.title: Responsible Sourcing
settings.text:
We are committed to taking into account  social and environmental consideration when sourcing our ingredients. We choose only responsibly managed resources and responsible suppliers.  

Planting Trees

We will plant a tree for each bottle sold, in an effort to supporting global reforestation, partnering with environmental non-profit tree planting charities that plant tees in countries around the world.

Certified Cruelty-Free

No tests on animals at any point in our manufacturing system or supply chain. We are certified Cruelty-Free by the internationally recognized Leaping Bunny Program.

What is the difference between a face oil and an oil-based serum?


Oil-based serums and face oils are similar to each other, but serums would include more concentrated ingredients, exclusive, rare, and finer oils. Additionally, the formulations are more complicated, containing more performance ingredients and herbal extracts, all dedicated to solving a specific skin concern. LILIXIR Ageless Rejuvenating Serums work to rejuvenate your skin, reduce fine lines and improve firmness, tone and hydration for a more radiant, smooth and replenished complexion.


From what age can I use the oil-based serum?

If you think anti-aging and rejuvenating skincare products are only for aging skin, you're wrong. Prevention is key and you should start incorporating anti-aging actives into your skincare routine as soon as possible. It's important to start decades before your skin starts to wrinkle and sag. We recommend that you add an anti-aging serum to your beauty routine from the age of 20 and continue to adapt it to your needs.



What type of skin are your serums suitable for?

LILIXIR Ageless rejuvenating serums are suitable for all skin types. They are formulated for mature, dry, sensitive and digitally tired skin. These rejuvenating serums are gentle, lightweight and fast absorbing. They contain a high percentage of cold-pressed oils rich in linoleic acid, which will help acne-prone skin as well as oily skin balance their natural oil (sebum) production.


Should I use the oil-based serum before or after the moisturizer?

We recommend using face serums before your moisturizer for best results. The moisturizer will seal the serum close to your skin and enhance its performance.


Can I use LILIXIR Ageless rejuvenating serums on sensitive, acne-prone or oily skin?

Yes. These natural serums contain a high percentage of cold-pressed oils, rich in linoleic acid, which will help acne-prone skin as well as oily skin to balance their natural oil (sebum) production. However, we recommend that you do a test patch on your hand before you start using it on your face, to make sure you don't have an allergic reaction.


The essential oils of LILIXIR Ageless serums are not sensitizing?

LILIXIR Ageless Rejuvenating serums contain the right amount of essential oils to make them effective, at the same time, the sensitizing components of essential oils are formulated to be well below skin limits accepted by international regulators. Thus, this makes them safe to use on any skin type, especially for sensitive and damaged skin. Not recommended for children under 12 years old.



Can I use LILIXIR Ageless serums for face massage to reduce wrinkles?

Yes, you can use LILIXIR Ageless rejuvenating serums to massage your face and neck to achieve luminous and youthful skin. For this you will need a little more serum, so that it is not absorbed too quickly. We recommend using facial massage tools such as a gua sha stone or a roller.


Is anti-aging serum good for young skin?

We recommend that you start adding anti-aging components to your skincare routine in your 20s. Prevention is the key. Before the age of 20, your skin continues to regenerate naturally at high speed, so there is no need for anti-aging ingredients.

settings.title: We are different
settings.text:
LILIXIR is a Canadian, natural beauty brand from Montreal, Quebec. We offer 100% plant-based, clean and green, effective beauty products.

We dedicate our effortless, sustainable, inclusive, skin-changing formulas to conscious consumers who would like to benefit from high-performance organic and natural experience.

Our vision is to be a sustainable beauty brand that cares and contributes to overall well-being: healthy skin, happy people, and a safe planet.

settings.title: Canadian Sustainable Skincare
settings.text:
LILIXIR team believes in taking a holistic approach when developing our sustainable packaging solutions!

It must be of high quality while experiencing our impact on the environment. This is a win for us, our customers and our planet.

We are committed to making your products as eco-friendly and sustainable as possible! From the box, tape and bottles to the products themselves.

Sustainable packaging is environmentally friendly and does not contribute to the depletion of natural resources. We believe in sourcing, developing and using packaging solutions that have minimal environmental impact and CO2 footprint.

We take sustainability seriously and are committed to planting a tree for every bottle sold. This not only helps combat deforestation, but also offsets the carbon emissions associated with the production and transportation of their products.

Let's grow a forest together!

Discover the power of botanical actives with LILIXIR restorative elixirs, concentrated solutions, entirely natural and sophisticated, science-based skincare formulations. Immerse yourself in the allure of our exquisite, high-performance, gender-neutral and sustainable beauty products, handcrafted with love in Montreal, Canada.
